title: Software Developer
description: Developed high-performance mobile apps for customers and vendors with fast startup, smooth UI, and cross-platform consistency. Built and launched a responsive company website with engaging landing and direct app download links.

title: Research
description: Researched web page quality and speed, validated web metrics through practical experiments, and scraped real-world data using Headless Puppeteer and Python. Automated metric evaluation with Lighthouse and JavaScript.
